name: Ship Name Generator
description: Ahoy there, matey! Need a name that'll make your vessel the envy of the seven seas? Our Ship Name Generator will conjure up nautical monikers that are seaworthy, stylish, and sure to turn heads (or keels!).
introduction: Embark on a voyage of nomenclature! Whether you're naming a majestic galleon, a speedy yacht, or even a humble rowboat, the perfect ship name is crucial. It's gotta sound cool, reflect your ship's personality (yes, ships have personalities!), and maybe even strike a little fear into the hearts of your rivals. Let's get those creative sails unfurled!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and behold the wonders of nautical naming!
Don't like what you see? Click again! We've got enough combinations to name every ship in the galaxy (and a few from other galaxies too, probably).
Feeling picky? Mix and match the prefixes and suffixes we provide, or let them inspire your own unique creations.
Once you've found the perfect name, shout it from the crow's nest! (Or, you know, just copy and paste it.)

faqs.question: Is this generator really free?
faqs.answer: Aye, it's as free as the wind in your sails! No hidden fees, no buried treasure required.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: You bet! Once you've generated a name you love, it's all yours. Just don't blame us if your ship becomes *too* famous.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Keep hitting that 'Generate' button! With countless combinations, you're bound to find something that floats your boat. Or, get inspired and create your own masterpiece!

faqs.question: Are the names generated truly random?
faqs.answer: As random as a kraken's mood swings! We use a complex algorithm (aka a bunch of cool code) to ensure a fresh batch of names every time.

faqs.question: Will these names bring me good luck?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee smooth sailing, a great name certainly sets the stage for adventure! Plus, a cool name is always good for morale.

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes or suffixes for the generator?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We're always looking to expand our nautical vocabulary. Send your suggestions our way and we might just add them to the mix!
